title: paramAtma hEgihanendare
sahitya:
paramAtma hEgihanendare akO hAgihane parabomma 
hEgihanendare ikO hIgihane tanna suddi tAne balla


caraNam 1    kAlillade naDesuva kaiyillade kELisuva hArage oLage irutippa kANisi koLanu
    caraNam 2    kSIrasAgara kaDedu shvEta dvIpadalli tAne nindu anantAsanadi malagi purandara viTTala
